00026 size_t LinearInterpolation::interpolate(const std::vector <FrameWithId>& in, std::vector <FrameWithId>& out, double step, size_t numberOfsteps = 0) {
00027 #ifdef DEBUG
00028     Stopwatch stopwatch;
00029     stopwatch.start();
00030 #endif
00031     size_t result = linearInterpolation(in, out, step, numberOfsteps);
00032 #ifdef DEBUG  
00033     stopwatch.stop();
00034     LOG("Linear interpolation:");
00035     LOG("  - input end point: %f, %f", in.back().p.x(), in.back().p.y());
00036     LOG("  - output end point: %f, %f", out.back().p.x(), out.back().p.y());
00037     LOG("  - step size: %f", step);
00038     LOG("  - iterations : %lu", result);
00039     LOG("  - duration : %f ms", stopwatch.getElapsedTime());
00040 #endif  
00041     return result;
00042 }
00043 
00044 size_t LinearInterpolation::linearInterpolation(const std::vector <FrameWithId>& in,
00045         std::vector <FrameWithId>& out,
00046         double step,
00047         size_t numberOfSteps = 0) {
00048 
00049     if (in.size() < 1)
00050         return 0;
00051 
00052    
00053     
00054     size_t counter = 0;
00055     std::vector <FrameWithId> localCopy = in;
00056     double x0, y0, z0, xn, yn, zn, x, y, z, r, p;
00057 
00058     
00059     for (size_t i = 0; i < localCopy.size()-1; ++i) {
00060         x0 = localCopy[i].p.x();
00061         y0 = localCopy[i].p.y();
00062         localCopy[i].M.GetRPY(r, p, z0);
00063 
00064         xn = localCopy[i + 1].p.x();
00065         yn = localCopy[i + 1].p.y();
00066         localCopy[i + 1].M.GetRPY(r, p, zn);
00067 
00068         double distance = sqrt((xn - x0)*(xn - x0) + (yn - y0)*(yn - y0));
00069         size_t steps = static_cast<size_t> (floor(distance / step));
00070       //  LOG("x0=%f, y0=%f, xn=%f, yn=%f", x0, y0, xn, yn);
00071       //  LOG("distance=%f, steps=%lu", distance, steps);
00072         
00073         for (size_t v = 0; v <= steps; ++v) {
00074             x = x0 + (xn - x0) / steps*v;
00075             y = y0 + (yn - y0) / steps*v;
00076             z = z0 + (zn - z0) / steps*v;
00077             
00078       //      LOG("x=%f, y=%f", x, y);
00079             
00080             FrameWithId frame;
00081             frame.id = localCopy[i].id;
00082             frame.p.x(x);
00083             frame.p.y(y);
00084             frame.p.z(z);
00085             frame.M.DoRotZ(z);
00086             out.push_back(frame);
00087             ++counter;
00088             if (counter >= (numberOfSteps - 1) && numberOfSteps != 0) {
00089                 return counter;
00090             }
00091         }
00092 
00093         
00094     }
00095 
00096     
00097     
00098     return counter;
00099 
00100 }
